document_data.name: Underdark
document_data.mainbody: The '''Underdark''' was a tavern in the [[Trades Ward of Waterdeep|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Interior: The Underdark tavern had a secret passage that led to [[Undermountain]] in the back of the establishment's basement. The passage was hidden behind a movable rack of shelves filled with supplies in the far back corner. Behind the shelves was a door locked with an iron bar that led to a long staircase shrouded in darkness that eventually led to [[Skullport]].
